title: Edica Group Inc. ('Edica Naturals') Launches World's First Supplement Focused Mindful Meditation Series for its Entire Plant-Based, Natural Supplement Line and Announces Mental Health Support Meditations
author: Edica Naturals
description: Edica Naturals is pleased to introduce TWO NEW series of Mindful Meditations in honor of May's Mental Health Awareness Month.
cleaned_text: World's First Supplement Focused Mindful Meditation Series for its Entire Plant-Based, Natural Supplement Line and Announces Mental Health Support Meditations Edica Naturals supports Mental Health Awareness Month with Mindful Meditations. TORONTO, ON / ACCESSWIRE / May 09, 2023 / [Edica Naturals](https://pr.report/UT0kctPe) is pleased to introduce TWO NEW series of [Mindful Meditations](https://pr.report/eaOA30-Q) in honor of May's Mental Health Awareness Month. The first series, includes Mental Health Support Mediations that are designed to help those suffering from mental health issues or those who are providing support for sufferers. These meditations teach how to meditate; how to reduce anxiety, depression, or dark thoughts; and ways to find balance as the supporter of a mental health sufferer. The second series includes Product Specific Meditations. These meditations are designed to naturally complement Edica Naturals' anti-aging and [Ann Barnes](https://pr.report/WjvBwqC8), explains: "Meditation has been used for centuries to promote greater mental balance and physical wellness. Our plant-based, natural supplements are also designed to bring greater balance to the mind and body. These NEW Product Specific Meditations are designed to accelerate and heighten each product's designed results." Each one of Edica Naturals' supplemental products are designed to address a variety of aging issues which impacts: libido, menopause, testosterone, brain, joints, respiratory and immunity. [Edica Naturals Products](https://pr.report/qcDvrje3) are designed to achieve positive results within 30 days. Ann says that: "Our products are approved by Health Canada, reviewed by the FDA, and are designed to work within 30 days. We developed the Product Specific Meditations to complement and support each of our Edica Naturals products and the intended results." The Meditations are done by a veteran healer and Reiki Master, are between 10-15 minutes in length and free to all on the company's website. About Edica Group Inc: Edica Group Inc. (carrying on business as "Edica Naturals") is a leading provider of natural and plant-based supplements and botanical beauty products that help men and women rejuvenate, nurture, and beautify.
